Portsmouth Cycle Forum

Portsmouth Cycle Forum is a group for anyone who cycles, or wants to cycle, in and around Portsmouth UK.

Events

Bike Bus to Lifeboat Station Open Day

Tuesday 9 August 2011
1 min

All aboard the bike bus to the lifeboat station open day.

Join us for a ride to Ferry Road for the fun on Sunday 14th August. Check out the Lifeboat station website for more details of the day. We will also be there checking bikes over

caption="it'll look nothing like this!"]

(in return for a small donation to the lifeboat station fundraising)

Bike Bus Timetable:

11 at The Hard 11.15 Guildhall Square 11.30 Palmerston Road (o/s Knight and Lee) 11.45 South Parade Pier 12 arrive at the Lifeboat day

We will return people at 3pm if they express a wish.

Hope to pick you up along the way!
